website_summaries.verdict: Converts from a single stroller to a tandem stroller. A worthwhile investment for parents who anticipate having another child or don't require two seats all the time.
pros: rear seat is removable for use as a single stroller
Front seat can be adjusted and used as a bassinet
Standing platform is ideal for older children
Staggered design is more compact than many similar models, even with the rear seat attached
Can be used with a Graco Click Connect car seat
cons: Storage basket doesn't hold much with the rear seat attached
Front seat completely blocks babies sitting in the back

customer_reviews.title: Too big, bulky, and wide
customer_reviews.text: I hate this stroller and I’m mad at myself for buying it. We will be returning it. It is huge and bulky. It is very wide at the back. It’s as wide as a wheelchair I think!! I bought this for my newborn and 2 1/2 year old. My 2 1/2 year old doesn’t even fit in the seats. She is too tall. Her head hits the covering and she has to duck her head under.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good but snack tray too far from child
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller however there are a couple things I would change. I really like how smooth the stroller is and it doesn't feel heavy when pushing like other larger strollers are, even with my son standing on the back. However I wish the seat reclined a little bit more without having to put it in bassinet mode. Also the snack tray is way too far from the seat! Even with my 5 year old sitting in the seat theres a huge gap between them and the tray.
customer_reviews.author: MelindaS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Wish the second seat could collapse and be stored in the basket and wish that the wheels collapsed when the stroller is folded. Otherwise my 3.5th, 37lbs son and my premie sized 4 week old (added an infant padding like for a carseat) fit in this perfectly. A bit hard to manuver one handed. More cup holders would be sweet. I really like the bassinet feature. So into it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: That’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: That stroller is awesome. Super Durable and comfortable. Only a little big for Asian woman ( I am 4”10) . But for overall it is a great one.
customer_reviews.author: ok2chatt

customer_reviews.title: Okay overall..
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility but it is quite large. Wish the wheels were made of rubber and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 4 biological children I've tried many different double strollers. All of them were so much better than this! We have two foster babies, brothers, that I needed a double stroller for. We had given away all our others and had a budget of 200. We bought this when it was on sale. I wish I would've listened to the bad reviews. This is simple to set up. I put both babes in and couldn't get it to turn very easily. I chalked it up to just needing to be moved and more. Nope. This thing has gotten even harder to maneuver. I feel bad even trying to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the huge size...
customer_reviews.text: Very Huge and heavy, it's hard to take the bus with the double version. We didn't expect this huge size... However it is very easy to switch between the different way to use it. And it is very cool to use the car seat anytime we need it. Be aware about the size of your car trunk sometimes the stroller don't fit in it. I use to say «this stroller is a tank» In the comparatif between this stroller and the double stroller Britax they said it's the same size but it's definitely not true. Britax is more expensive but lighter and smaller. When you are living in an apartment it make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great - requires trunk space though
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who likes this stroller more me or my almost 3 year old! Haha she is always asking to sit in it even when we are inside so I’m assuming it’s comfortable. There are so many different ways to use this. I love that we can click our car seat into it directly not just into a seat; it makes it less bulky. I wish the wheels folded though because it hardly fits in the back of my Chevy traverse with the 3rd row up. So there isn’t any room for our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Greatest double I have found
customer_reviews.text: It is a really big stroller. I have a town and country mini van and it takes up the cargo area. It us perfect for my 2 small kids and pushed so easy. I had a Phil and Ted before and replaced it with this stroller, for half the price and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for the stroller!! It’s so easy to set up, and so fast to fold back up! (The car seat in the pictures was not included) It works perfectly with my car seat, and I can see us using this A ALOT!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Stroller
customer_reviews.text: The best buy I made on Amazon. I was looking for a double stroller and that was the best choice I made. My daughter was going to be three years old and I had a newborn too, I was looking for a double stroller and he has several positions that you can use, you can use many years too Bought only separately, then the baby comfort to fit the best for a newborn. Now as it is bigger, I can already use the normal stroller, it is a very good double stroller highly recommend for 2
customer_reviews.author: Franciele Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate. Its a good decision
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. It works with our existing infant car seat and holds more than expected in bottom basket. Can’t wait for second baby to arrive so we can really put it to the test. Only complaint- which we knew getting into it- this is not a light or compact, so really it is more to be expected than a complaint. All-in-all: the price is great, love the look, feel, and functionality. Would absolutely recommend for anyone looking for a double stroller or a fresh take on what luxury models have been doing for a while...very thankful for Graco and their dedication to parent-ease (can you say one hand folding capability?!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Our family absolutely loves this stroller. I was nervous at first about the price tag and buying it online without seeing it in person first but it is so durable and has so many different riding options. I’m so glad we took a leap of faith and purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like anything about this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this stroller at all. I have a one year old and a 3 year old and thought the 3 could stand while the one sits. This stroller is huge and chunky. It’s enormous. I’ve have had many many strollers and this was the hardest one to put together and even harder to take apart to return. Not streamline, not modern, not easy to use. Do not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkole

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh.. Look into other doubles..
customer_reviews.text: I personally feel This is a cheaply made stroller... for the price I was expecting something like amazing. It’s really wobbly and sounds like it will fall apart at any given moment. Only giving it high stars because other than the cheap material it’s great for my newborn and 18 month old when Out and about definitely look into other double strollers out there before deciding on this one. There’s better ones that are cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Too big, too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love this, but instead I really dislike it. The stroller is so big and when you fold it down it just doesn't fit anywhere. Takes up a ton of space in the trunk so I always have to take it out for groceries. I love that it can grow with your family, but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if had no defaults
customer_reviews.text: Just received my stroller today. Did lots of research before buying this and it seemed like the best option. Assembly was not too hard, took about 10 minutes. There are a couple of issues. One, the front left wheel is very stiff and does not swivel at all. This makes it very difficult to move the stroller around. Second, the bottom seat does not click when put in place so it's not secure. It is Sunday today so I am hoping when I call customer service tomorrow they will be able to help with these issues. I have been very excited about this stroller so I hope these defects are easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THUS STROLLER! love the fact that I don’t have to buy a second seat right now since I can easily attach the car seat to it and use the toddler seat that it came with in the back for my daughter to use. Very durable. Very compact. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SabiBaby316

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: After years being a nanny, babysitter and now a mother of a toddler and baby, I can guaratee this is the best stroller ever! First, it is not heavy for the size. Second, I can move that seat all the way from bassinet to toddler seat, facing both ways. Third, my husband has a truck and I always got upset of my previous strollers getting the frame scratched or the fabric dirty because it stay in the back of truck. This one folds down and stays on the wheels. My stroller looks new even after weeks! Also, my kids loves it! I totally recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Milagres

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and it is amazing. She loves the versatility when she needs to use it for her 3 year old and her baby. It also can be like a pram that the baby loves to sit in and play.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but i still like it
customer_reviews.text: The front tray come off easily and it’s very heavy. But good part my 2 year old is comfortable and he left a tall kid and my 4 year old sits in the back. It’s easy to push.. with a newborn on the way it was easy to find a car seat that works for it well
customer_reviews.author: Sabriya

customer_reviews.title: funtional, expandable, sturdy...but bulky
customer_reviews.text: very nice versatile stroller. be aware it is heavy and does not fold to a small size. well built and very functional. i have the space to transport it, so the size/weight is not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just HUGE! And you have to take like apart every time. I would not buy it again just because of the work it takes to put in the van. BUT it’s a great walk stroller if your walking no hills.
customer_reviews.author: Corvvi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect concept, durability not so great
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this stroller for about a month now. The plastic wheel cover cracked the second time we used it. The handle bar doesn’t “click” into place so it makes it hard to steer. Other than that, the design seems great for my newborn and 3 year old. If it wasn’t for those two issues then this would be the perfect stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good stroller. I was looking for a stroller that would fit my son and new born baby. My son is a large kid and is really rough. So far this stroller has stood up to his size and force. Kinda wish the tires were not plastic though. The chairs click in and out really well. I have a small car and this is the only thing that fits in the trunk but with a bigger car I would think there would be enough room.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crnkovich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller. Great to be able to buy separately
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it wasnt super expensive and when I was expecting my dauhter I was able to place it on the stroller after having a C-section.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We already had a graco carseat to go with it and our growing family of 3 kids is simply enjoying the stroller. It is sturdy enough that i don't worry on different types of pavement. It works for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M

customer_reviews.title: Not the matching seat.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the same color pattern as the one I bought from target with the same name. Looks like they just made some shoulder pads and shade in the hazel color but the actual seat is all black. Here’s a side by side of the one from amazon and the one from target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Way to bulky for the car .. need a van to fit it anywhere. It doesnt fold w the seat so you have to unattach seat and put seat in car unfolded!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sibona

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and a great deal! I already bought the stroller which came with the first seat but it was definitely cheaper to buy them separately, even though the colors aren’t exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit big, but I absolutely love the quality of this stroller.. It has a very large basket underneath perfect for storage. Folds up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Streifel

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Only negative is that it can be stiff in the turns . Definitely not as easy to push as our jogger.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is huge in size. Closes/folds quickly. Its a bit bulky. Great for carrying load. The wheels make it easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.author: Ksarai

customer_reviews.title: Love!!! ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Love it. Easy to assemble, easy to operate, very good one hand control when need be because let’s be honest we all have been there before. 😂 Love that I can use the bassinet part as a seat for my toddler as I use the other part as a snap and go for my newborn and her car seat. Absolutely love this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Judge

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this stroller. My 5 year old loves to stand and watch her baby brother while we go out for walks. This is the main reason why we bought it. The only thing is that this stroller is not ideal for short people I'm 5'2 and feel like the handle is so high up.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Graco
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller! Really easy to convert into a double stroller and it's also very sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Dont spend thousands of dollars!
customer_reviews.text: DONT SPEND THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS IN OTHER DOUBLE STROLLERS. JUST BUY THIS. EASY TO HANDLE, SOLID, GOOD SPACES AND POSITIONS OF CHAIRS, EVERYTHING IS PERFECT FOR THE PRICE. ONLY PROBLEM IT TAKES LOT OF SPACE WHEN FOLDED. BUT WHAT I DO IS I PLANIFY MY TRIPS TO ONLY USE THE THINGS IM GOING TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good to use now and future
customer_reviews.text: Been watching this product, finally bought at$169 good saving, car is great for my up coming baby and if you plan to have another one, 2 baby one stroller it’s going to be convenient for you. Great
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected. I like it and it's nice. Definitely something you have to get used to
customer_reviews.author: Monique gomez

customer_reviews.title: Looked exactly like picture and was brand new in box
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Looked exactly like picture and was brand new in box!
customer_reviews.author: digdablue21

customer_reviews.title: Bulky Stroller...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is HUGE. It doesn’t fold easily....in fact you have to take the seat off to be able to fold it. If you can get past this then the stroller is great. I love the fact my 4y/o is able to jump on the back especially when we’re out in crowded places.
customer_reviews.author: Delesia Box

customer_reviews.title: actually not bad
customer_reviews.text: I liked the different combinations. Easy to pop open. And has a big basket. Didn’t like the Small wheels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 but heavier than listed!
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller and so does my 2 year old. I was quite disappointed at the weight however. It is listed at 22.75lbs when in reality it is 40lbs. The Graco video about the product lists the weight a 40lbs. I selected this one due to the lower weight and was quite deceived. Someone should update the specs on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, light, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Grace stroller is great, second baby and second Grace, that said it
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stroller at a second hand store. It was brand new but the seat was missing so I bought it off here and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: anna necochea

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Gits our stroller. perfect for when we have our baby and toddler niece with us on outings
customer_reviews.author: Rii Val

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maneuver, light, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stroller! Extremely easy to fold and unfold. Not heavy, and my baby is extremely comfortable in all the positions it goes too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bongiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Loved that it can turn into crib bed
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my 3year old and 1 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seat
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my youngest when she outgrew the infant seat.
customer_reviews.author: taylor woollen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 however the handle is not as rigid as one would expect to see. The plastic connections and pins separate at the main joint.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi Bander

customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad for a review would be the second seat as I unboxed it I noticed a cut/Rip on it. But overall I love the functionality of this stroller especially the option of a double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not run smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Too much trouble and not comfortable for baby and toddler
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A product you will enjoy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very nice, moves easily, comfortable and spacious. The only problem it’s too bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Emeldah e.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flexibility with abilities.
customer_reviews.text: Love how I can make it big or small depending on how many I have with me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not good because it’s very hard to move.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like and I wanna return if posible so please tell me I am worried
customer_reviews.author: Raza

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this product because the stroller came with another second seat
customer_reviews.author: Emeldah e.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great use if you have other toddler.
customer_reviews.text: It's always good to have a second chair if you have a growing to be toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddlers !!! Easy to clean and easy setup!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Gerena

customer_reviews.title: Manual
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the manual how do I ensamble this stroller??
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: color wasn’t specified in initial
customer_reviews.text: It came in the color pink so I sent it back. I had a boy and needed a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Toya Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Uno 2 Duo Second Seat
customer_reviews.text: Seat arrived sooner than expected delivery date!!! It also arrived in perfect brand new condition. Seat came in it's original box and was sealed as well. I wasn't sure what color I was getting although I have both a girl & a boy so it wouldn't have mattered. It was a girl seat. I'm perfectly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Damarise Fowler

product_meta.title: Graco Uno2Duo Double Stroller, Hayden
product_meta.description: Color:Hayden| Style:Double StrollerThe UNO2DUO double stroller starts out as a single stroller and expands into a double stroller to grow with your family. With the included second seat, the UNO2DUO double stroller has 11 ways to ride. With an easy, one-hand fold, parent cup holder, and extra-large storage basket, the UNO2DUO is a fully-featured stroller. The main seat reclines flat to become an infant bassinet, while the removable child's tray and standing platform offer a customizable ride. Incorporate an infant car seat (sold separately), and the UNO2DUO offers even more customization and riding options. For children up to 50 lb., the UNO2DUO stroller is truly, the only stroller you'll ever need. Never use bleach
feature_bullets: The UNO2DUO stroller starts as a single stroller and expands to a double stroller as your family grows
Simply extend the stroller 5" with one easy step when your family grows from 1 to 2 children
This versatile double stroller grows with your family for years with 11 ways to ride with one or two children
Two toddler seats included to accommodate two children from infancy in bassinet mode to toddler mode as they grow older
Reclining seat converts to an infant bassinet for on-the-go comfort for baby in both parent facing and forward facing modes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars234 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
